Package com.guardsquare.dexguard.runtime.detection

Class Summary
CertificateChecker This class contains a static method that checks whether the signature of the application is the expected signature.
DebugDetector This class provides a set of static methods enabling the detection of various debug related application states.
EmulatorDetector The EmulatorDetector class bundles various emulator detection techniques.

TamperDetector This class contains utility methods for tamper detection.
